name: daydreaming
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of thinking about pleasant things that you would like to do or have happen to you, instead of thinking about what is happening now: We can all admit to occasional daydreaming at work.
More examplesFewer examplesReserved and introverted, he loved movies and was prone to daydreaming.Time that kids spend watching TV would be better spent on sports, creative play, or just daydreaming.A hot summer afternoon is perfect for daydreaming.Daydreaming is harmless, but sooner or later you have to act.
